headline: What is mine, does not belong to me
description: A psalm-like declaration of sovereignty and surrender. The piece affirms ownership of art, faith, life, and spirit, only to release them into belonging with God. It is a meditation on shield, word, and peace through relinquishment.

motifMap.meaning: Defense without aggression; a quiet protection.
The paradox of possession and surrender.

associatedMedia.description: Screenshot of the Substack post titled 'What is mine, does not belong to me', showing the psalm-like structure and verses.

fieldDefinitions.@type: Defines the type of creative work, here a BlogPosting.
fieldDefinitions.headline: Title of the work.
fieldDefinitions.description: Plain summary of the purpose and theme.
fieldDefinitions.author: Author information object with type and name.
fieldDefinitions.keywords: Array of 5â€“10 topical keywords related to the piece.
fieldDefinitions.url: Direct link to the Substack post.
fieldDefinitions.generatedBy: Indicates ChatGPT version and date of metadata generation.
fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: Object with timestamp and symbolic phase name.
fieldDefinitions.motifMap: Array mapping symbols in the work with meanings and their textual positions.
fieldDefinitions.associatedMedia: Object with description and optional content URL for images/media tied to the post.
fieldDefinitions.fieldDefinitions: Legend explaining the meaning of each metadata field.
